languages.text: "Стал{mf||а} бы ты заключать сделку с червем? Или, скажем, своим питомцем?" {n}Друкари злобно хмыкает.{/n} "Я выдрессирую тебя так, что не посмеешь и думать о подобной дерзости вновь".

traits.locale_text: "Стал{mf||а} бы ты заключать сделку с червем? Или, скажем, своим питомцем?" {n}Друкари злобно хмыкает.{/n} "Я выдрессирую тебя так, что не посмеешь и думать о подобной дерзости вновь".
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."
languages.original_text: "Стал{mf||а} бы ты заключать сделку с червем? Или, скажем, своим питомцем?" {n}Друкари злобно хмыкает.{/n} "Я выдрессирую тебя так, что не посмеешь и думать о подобной дерзости вновь".

traits.locale_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even consider such insolence again."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even consider such insolence again."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

traits.locale_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: « Vous viendrait-il à l'idée de négocier avec un ver ? Ou disons, un animal de compagnie ? » {n}Le Drukhari s'esclaffe d'un air malveillant.{/n} « Lorsque j'en aurai terminé avec votre apprentissage, ce genre d'insolence ne vous traversera plus jamais l'esprit. »
languages.original_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."

traits.locale_text: « Vous viendrait-il à l'idée de négocier avec un ver ? Ou disons, un animal de compagnie ? » {n}Le Drukhari s'esclaffe d'un air malveillant.{/n} « Lorsque j'en aurai terminé avec votre apprentissage, ce genre d'insolence ne vous traversera plus jamais l'esprit. »
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: “你会和虫子谈判吗？或者说，你会和宠物谈判吗？”{n}玛拉斋发出了充满恶意的轻笑。{/n}“等我把你调教好了，你就不敢再这么傲慢了。”
languages.original_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."

traits.locale_text: “你会和虫子谈判吗？或者说，你会和宠物谈判吗？”{n}玛拉斋发出了充满恶意的轻笑。{/n}“等我把你调教好了，你就不敢再这么傲慢了。”
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: 「お前は虫やペットと交渉するのか？」{n}デュカーリは不敵に笑った。{/n}「俺のしつけが終われば、そんな傲慢なことは二度と考えられんだろうよ」
languages.original_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は虫やペットと交渉するのか？」{n}デュカーリは不敵に笑った。{/n}「俺のしつけが終われば、そんな傲慢なことは二度と考えられんだろうよ」
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Würdet Ihr denn mit einem Wurm verhandeln? Oder vielleicht einem Haustier?" {n}Der Drukhari kichert bösartig.{/n} "Wenn ich mit fertig bin mit Eurer Ausbildung, werdet Ihr nie wieder so unverschämt fragen."
languages.original_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."

traits.locale_text: "Würdet Ihr denn mit einem Wurm verhandeln? Oder vielleicht einem Haustier?" {n}Der Drukhari kichert bösartig.{/n} "Wenn ich mit fertig bin mit Eurer Ausbildung, werdet Ihr nie wieder so unverschämt fragen."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: «¿Negociarías tú con un gusano? ¿O con una mascota?». {n}El Drukhari se ríe maliciosamente.{/n} «Cuando concluyan tus lecciones, no volverás a pensar en semejante insolencia».
languages.original_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."

traits.locale_text: «¿Negociarías tú con un gusano? ¿O con una mascota?». {n}El Drukhari se ríe maliciosamente.{/n} «Cuando concluyan tus lecciones, no volverás a pensar en semejante insolencia».
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai

languages.text: "Sen olsan karıncayla veya köpekle pazarlık yapar mıydın?" {n}Drukhari, kendi kendine sinsice gülüyor.{/n} "Seni hele bir eğiteyim, böyle küstahlıklar bir daha aklının ucundan geçmeyecek."
languages.original_text: "Would you negotiate with a worm? Or, say, a pet?" {n}The Drukhari chuckles malevolently.{/n} "After I am done with your training, you will never even think of such insolence again."

traits.locale_text: "Sen olsan bir karıncayla veya bir köpekle pazarlık yapar mıydın?" {n}Drukhari kendi kendine sinsice gülüyor.{/n} "Seni hele bir eğiteyim, böyle küstahlıklar bir daha asla aklına bile gelmeyecek."
traits.speaker: YrlietAbductionMarazhai
